quote: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.
name: Shawn Ashmore

quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.

quote: Each day, I come in with a positive attitude, trying to get better.

quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.

quote: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.

quote: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: Being sexy is all about attitude, not body type. It's a state of mind.

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.

quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
name: Walter Scott

quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.

quote: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.

quote: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.

quote: Acting is magical. Change your look and your attitude, and you can be anyone.

quote: Our attitude towards others determines their attitude towards us.

quote: My attitude is never to be satisfied, never enough, never.

quote: All I can control is myself and just keep having a positive attitude.

quote: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Age and size are only numbers. It's the attitude you bring to clothes that make the difference.

quote: Your attitude towards failure determines your altitude after failure.

quote: I can only control myself, my actions, my work ethic, and my attitude.

quote: Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people whom we personally dislike.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Always keep that happy attitude. Pretend that you are holding a beautiful fragrant bouquet.

quote: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman - not the attitude of the prospect.

quote: Pink isn't just a color, it's an attitude!

quote: Cock your hat - angles are attitudes.
name: Frank Sinatra

quote: It's not true that clothes look better on skinny girls; what counts is the attitude.

quote: Civilization is a method of living, an attitude of equal respect for all men.

quote: Eagles come in all shapes and sizes, but you will recognize them chiefly by their attitudes.
name: E. F. Schumacher

quote: The higher the better. It's more about an attitude. High heels empower women in a way.

quote: Always have an attitude of gratitude.

quote: What is pride? A rocket that emulates the stars.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic.

quote: Attitude is attitude, whether you're a West Coast gangster or East Coast gangster, you know?

quote: Great effort springs naturally from great attitude.

quote: Fairness is not an attitude. It's a professional skill that must be developed and exercised.

quote: I think whether you're having setbacks or not, the role of a leader is to always display a winning attitude.

quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.

quote: A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.

quote: Our environment, the world in which we live and work, is a mirror of our attitudes and expectations.

quote: Attitude determines the altitude of life.

quote: The ABC's are attitude, behavior and communication skills.

quote: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.

quote: My attitude is, a monument, a statue, ought to signify unity instead of division.

quote: My attitude is, if someone's going to criticize me, tell me to my face.
name: Simon Cowell

quote: My attitude is always one of sensuality, aggressive enthusiasm and a kind of outrageousness in my expression.

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.

quote: Youth is really in your attitude, not in what you look like.

quote: It's just sad that one's attitude is always speculated, even if you've not done something.

quote: Out here in California, in the Pacific Ocean, the sharks have a bad attitude.

quote: I have an attitude. It's what I do. I'm edgy. I have an attitude.

quote: A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.

quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.

quote: But the attitude of faith is to let go, and become open to truth, whatever it might turn out to be.

quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.

quote: For me, bomber jackets are smart, but they are also street and have a lot of attitude.

quote: I am just as comfortable in sweats and sneakers as I am in a dress and heels. Attitude is everything!

quote: My attitude is that, if you have nothing to hide, why not show it?

quote: I walk tall; I got a tall attitude.

quote: Solidarity is an attitude of resistance, I suppose, or it should be.
name: Christopher Hitchens

quote: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.

quote: All we need, really, is a change from a near frigid to a tropical attitude of mind.

quote: Most of us start out with a positive attitude and a plan to do our best.

quote: I thought one should have the attitude of 'What do you care what other people think!'

quote: My attitude is, do as much as I can while I'm free. And if I'm arrested I'll still do as much as I can.

quote: It is not the body's posture, but the heart's attitude that counts when we pray.

quote: Fame is O.K. I hate it, but it's O.K. I'm beginning to understand how I can be hidden. It's an attitude.
